nodes.title: [JENKINS-50242] Improved help text to correct a misunderstanding
[JENKINS-49535] Improve error message when credentials entry is not found
Avoid NPE when usernamevar not specified
[JENKINS-44860] Username in a UsernamePasswordMultiBinding should not be considered sensitive
[JENKINS-28399] Add binding for SSH private keys (with PR #36)
Close logger to avoid file descriptor leaks
Ease writing of new on-disk Binding implementations (take 2)
[FIXED JENKINS-42999] Allow bindings to specify their required context
use jenkins 1.642.4, to avoid requests to usage.jenkins.io from automated tests
Fix a bug with masking of secrets containing other secrets as substrings.
[JENKINS-24805] Start masking secrets in freestyle logs.
[JENKINS-38831] Add support for credential tracking in SecretBuildWrapper and BindingStep
Ease writing of new on-disk Binding implementations
Adding symbols to binding types for easier usage
Mention secret text as part of pipeline option.
[JENKINS-37541] Protect ourselves against deserialization with null binding
[JENKINS-28399] Add binding for SSH private keys
[FIXED JENKINS-35490] Ensure the expressionAllowed variable is captured for the hetero-add
[JENKINS-35095] Findbugs issues. Migrate to 2.9 parent pom.
[JENKINS-32943] Use a standardized temporary directory for secretFiles
[FIXED JENKINS-30941] do not set directories to 0400 on unix if you want to delete their contents...
Fix resource leak identified by eclipse
[FIXED JENKINS-23468] Permit multiple variables per binding
[FIXED JENKINS-29255] Restricting secret file visibility to avoid "WARNING: UNPROTECTED PRIVATE KEY FILE!" when using as ssh key
Code improvements, some deprecated API calls replaced and JSR 305 removed
Enable ssh keys to be written with user provided property
Do not suggest `passphraseVariable: '', usernameVariable: ''` in snippet generator
[JENKINS-64361] Make fix for JENKINS-44860 apply to Pipeline step arguments as well (take II)
[JENKINS-64361] Make fix for JENKINS-44860 apply to Pipeline step arguments as well
Introduced `MaskingOutputStream` to DRY between Pipeline & freestyle
[JENKINS-44860] Allow usernames to be left unmasked in build log
Improve interpolation documentation and changelog references
Bump authorize-project from 1.3.0 to 1.4.0 and update to 2.235.x line
Replace 'slave' with 'agent' in README and help text
Add some documentation about not masking multi-line secrets.
Noting that the changelog is old, and some other miscellany
Do not mask secrets shorter than (3) characters.
Add support for Almquist shell in masking
Update credentials plugin from 2.1.7 to 2.1.19 (2.2.0) CVE-2019-10320
Prototypes around better support for user-scoped credentials
Java 11 readiness: build both on JDK8 and JDK11
Trying to avoid a test flake
Adapt tests to spaces in temp directories
[JENKINS-42950] Making users more aware of behavior
[JENKINS-44860] Allow usernameVariable to be omitted to bypass masking
